name: 9th Zillertal Bike Challenge
description:
The inimitable MTB marathon through the Zillertal Valley is taking place again from the 30th June till the 2nd July 2017. Participants can look forward to another grandiose racing experience this year!

“3 days, 3 categories, 1 goal” 
“The pain passes, the pride remains” 

The Zillertal Bike Challenge has established itself in recent years as a firm fixture in the European mountain bike scene’s racing calendar. No wonder, as this 3 day stage race promises spectacular climbs, unparalleled single trails and sensational mountain panoramas. The finishing stretch at the Hintertux Glacier is guaranteed to be an unforgettable experience for all participants. 

Mayrhofen-Hippach holiday region is delighted to welcome Zillertal Bike Challenge participants, as destination town for the second stage of this race.
